multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers."},"TransferSingle(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `value` tokens of token type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`."},"URI(string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"changeMaxHorses(uint256)":{"params":{"_newLimit":": new maximum number of horse NFTs"}},"checkHorseBalance(address)":{"params":{"_racer":": address of the racer"}},"constructor":{"details":"See {@openzeppelin/ERC1155-constructor}."},"horseStats(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_horseId":": ID of the horse","_statId":": 0 for \"level\", 1 for \"speed\", 2 for \"durability\", 3 for \"stability\""}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"mintCoin(uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":": amount of in-game Coins to be minted"}},"mintUtil(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":": the amount of the utility NFTs that will be minted","_quality":": the quality of the utility NFT (Low quality: 1, High quality: 2)","_type":": the type of the utility NFT (Speed: 10, Durability: 20, Stability: 30)"}},"mintUtilBatch(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_amounts":": amounts of the utility NFTs that will be minted","_qualities":": quality of the utility NFTs (Low quality: 1, High quality: 2)","_types":": types of the utility NFTs (Speed: 10, Durability: 20, Stability: 30)"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_newPrice":": new price","_type":": 0 for Horse, 1 for token"}},"setURI(string)":{"params":{"_newURI":": new URI for NFTs"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeHorse(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_horseId":": ID of the horse","_stat":": ID of the stat that will be upgraded: \"10\" for Speed, \"20\" for Durability, \"30\" for Stability"}},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type ID."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"changeMaxHorses(uint256)":{"notice":"Changes maximum number of Horses that can be minted"},"checkHorseBalance(address)":{"notice":"returns the number of all horses and their IDs for the given address as an the sender"},"mintHorse()":{"notice":"mints one horse for the sender param _name : name of the horse param _age : age of the horse"},"mintHorse(address)":{"notice":"mints one horse for the given address param _name : name of the horse param _age : age of the horse"},"mintUtil(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"mints Utility NFTs"},"mintUtilBatch(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[])":{"notice":"[Batched] version of mintUtil"},"setPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"sets the NTF minting price to a new value"},"setURI(string)":{"notice":"set URI to a new value"},"upgradeHorse(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"upgrade the requested stat of the given horse"},"withdrawAll()":{"notice":"Withdraws all  Matic
